document.full_text: finnish director aki kaurismaki tackles the tough theme of illegal immigration in his touching fairy tale "le havre," launching on tuesday in cannes where enthusiasm for the competition films is hotting up.
document.title: finnish fairytale wins fans, cannes films warm up
lines_and_colors: finnish director aki kaurismaki tackles the tough theme of illegal immigration in his touching fairy tale "le havre," launching on tuesday in cannes where enthusiasm for the competition films is hotting up.
